book.synopsis: A food expert who has spent three decades giving seminars and workshops on whole food cookery shares her wisdom and expertise in this alphabetically arranged and fully cross-referenced volume on healthy eating. Original.
book.title_long: The New Whole Foods Encyclopedia: A Comprehensive Resource for Healthy Eating (Compass)
book.dimensions: Height: 9.25 Inches, Length: 7.5 Inches, Weight: 1.4 Pounds, Width: 1 Inches
